name: yaml-multiline
description: Find the right syntax for your YAML multiline strings

scripts.clean: yarn && find . | grep -v '^./node_modules' | git check-ignore --stdin | xargs -r rm
scripts.build:style: touch style.min.css && npm run build:index && node-sass style.scss > style.css && uncss -u uncssrc.json index.html | uglifycss --max-line-len 160 > style.min.css
scripts.build: npm run build:style && npm run build:index
scripts.deploy: npm build:style && pug -O '{production:true}' index.pug && scp index.html favicon.ico favicon-512.png yaml-multiline.info:/srv/http-static/yaml-multiline.info/
